title: Hardware I use in 2023
metaDescription: Explore the tech hardware that powers my daily life in 2023. Get insights into my laptop, monitor, keyboard, mouse, and more that make my life efficient.

body.raw:
# Hardware I Use: A Glimpse into My Tech Setup

In this "My Personal Tech Gear" section, I'm excited to give you a tour of the tech hardware that powers my everyday life. You'll get an inside look at the keyboards, phone chargers, and other essential items that I rely on daily. Join me as we explore these everyday tech heroes that make life just a little bit easier and a whole lot more efficient.

## My Laptop

<ProductCard
  product={{
    name: 'MacBook Pro Apple M2 Pro 14.2"',
    price: '2.799,00â‚¬',
    rating: 4.7,
    reviewCount: 166,
    href: 'https://www.amazon.de/-/en/MNW83D-A/dp/B0BSHHBH3N?crid=2ZSH50FISFTJO&keywords=apple+macbook+pro+m2&qid=1688237944&s=computers&sprefix=apple+macbook+pro+m2%2Ccomputers%2C96&sr=1-3&linkCode=ll1&tag=felixvemmerpersonalblog-21&linkId=134bd667108ab16e47c9c2a39a1662db&language=en_GB&ref_=as_li_ss_tl&ref=felixvemmer.com',
    imageSrc: '/pages/hardware/61fd2oCrvyL._AC_SL1500_.jpg',
    imageAlt: 'MacBook Pro Apple M2 Pro 14.2"',
  }}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="ðŸ‘ Pros">
  Love the all day battery life, super good performance, excellent display, speakers, trackpad and
  keyboard. A blast to work with even when travelling or working remotely. Also the value and price
  lasts for quite some time so I see it as a long-term investment.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="ðŸ‘Ž Cons">
  Super super pricy. If someone steals it or you spill water over it it's game over. Apart from that
  excellent machine.
</Callout>

## My Monitor

<ProductCard
  product={{
    name: 'Dell UltraSharp 40" WUHD Monitor',
    price: '1.432,79â‚¬',
    rating: 4.4,
    reviewCount: 32,
    href: 'https://www.amazon.de/dp/B08VH5JFXF?th=1&psc=1&linkCode=ll1&tag=felixvemmerpersonalblog-21&linkId=db8dd8d81bde08912f6829eb40641b6a&language=en_GB&ref_=as_li_ss_tl&ref=felixvemmer.com',
    imageSrc: '/pages/hardware/61PNf3qedPL._AC_SL1200_.jpg',
    imageAlt: 'Dell UltraSharp 40" WUHD Monitor',
  }}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="ðŸ‘ Pros">
  Excellent monitor that was recommended to me by a friend. The 5k resolution display is a joy to
  work with. Fits three windows easily, so perfect for web development. Also comes with a USB-C Port
  so you can connect and charge your USB-C compatible laptop with one single cable.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="ðŸ‘Ž Cons">
  For some reason the monitor does not fall asleep. So at the end of the day I need to power it off.
</Callout>

## My Keyboard

<ProductCard
  product={{
    name: 'Apple Magic Keyboard with Touch ID',
    price: '159.00â‚¬',
    rating: 4.7,
    reviewCount: 1069,
    href: 'https://www.amazon.de/-/en/Apple-Magic-Keyboard-Touch-Chip/dp/B09BRGW5KV?crid=1HWG4XL7DW43E&keywords=apple+keyboard&qid=1688238775&s=computers&sprefix=apple+keyboar%2Ccomputers%2C109&sr=1-9&linkCode=ll1&tag=felixvemmerpersonalblog-21&linkId=690e3b3935e12fa5ab2c5ee47d4a406e&language=en_GB&ref_=as_li_ss_tl&ref=felixvemmer.com',
    imageSrc: '/pages/hardware/71I8hC4yHQL._AC_SL1500_.jpg',
    imageAlt: 'Apple Magic Keyboard with Touch ID',
  }}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="ðŸ‘ Pros">
  Super convenient to authenticate with TouchID if you're locked into the apple ecosystem. Battery
  life is fantastic and typing experience great if you like the Mac style typing experience.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="ðŸ‘Ž Cons">
  Quite pricy for a simple keyboard, as most of the Apple products.
</Callout>

## My Mouse

<ProductCard
  product={{
    name: 'Logitech MX Master 3S',
    price: '59.99â‚¬',
    rating: 4.6,
    reviewCount: 6570,
    href: 'https://www.amazon.de/dp/B07W6H4R4G?th=1&linkCode=ll1&tag=felixvemmerpersonalblog-21&linkId=77d87bee5d902a6feb5ddd0d97b61e1c&language=en_GB&ref_=as_li_ss_tl&ref=felixvemmer.com',
    imageSrc: '/pages/hardware/61TU7cMHepL._AC_SL1500_.jpg',
    imageAlt: 'Logitech MX Master 3S',
  }}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="ðŸ‘ Pros">
  Amazing ergonomic and just feels great in your hands. Perfectly tuned for Mac users (e.g. mission
  control, swiping etc.).
</Callout>

## My Charger

<ProductCard
  product={{
    name: 'Anker 3-in-1 Cube with MagSafe',
    price: '154,99â‚¬',
    rating: 5,
    reviewCount: 19,
    href: 'https://www.anker.com/eu-de/products/y1811?variant=43451250999459',
    imageSrc: '/pages/hardware/HQ3E2_AV1.jpeg',
    imageAlt: 'Anker 3-in-1 Cube with MagSafe',
    buttonLabel: "View on Anker's Website",
  }}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="ðŸ‘ Pros">
  Perfect for traveling and just super convenient to charge all three devices with no cables.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="ðŸ‘Ž Cons">
  Magnetic field not super strong if you use a charging case. Never paid so much money for a phone
  charger.
</Callout>

## My Light

<ProductCard
  product={{
    name: 'XIAOMI Mi Computer Monitor Light Bar',
    price: '47,34â‚¬',
    rating: 4.9,
    reviewCount: 85,
    href: 'https://www.banggood.com/XIAOMI-Mi-Computer-Monitor-Light-Bar-2_4GHz-wireless-Remote-Control-No-Screen-Reflection-Eyes-Protection-Ra95-USB-Lamp-Display-Hanging-Light-p-1983555.html?imageAb=2&utm_design=18&utm_click=6&utm_email=1684520921_3671_6&utm_source=emarsys&utm_medium=OrderConfirmReceipt&utm_campaign=trigger-logistics&utm_content=leander&sc_src=email_4320992&sc_eh=22761497749dcbbf1&sc_llid=11893603&sc_lid=180720778&sc_uid=vcK7dvB195&akmClientCountry=DE&a=1688239946.1302&cur_warehouse=CN&DCC=DE&currency=EUR&akmClientCountry=DE',
    imageSrc: '/pages/hardware/2573677-n0.jpg',
    imageAlt: 'XIAOMI Mi Computer Monitor Light Bar',
    buttonLabel: "View on Banggood's Website",
  }}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="ðŸ‘ Pros">
  Perfect for longer coding nights. No reflection from the monitor and neat looking wireless control
  for switching light warmth and intensity.
</Callout>

<Callout className="my-4" title="ðŸ‘Ž Cons">
  Hardly fits on big screens like the one, I recommended above, but it just barely works, although
  on smaller monitors the fit is probably even better.
</Callout>

## My Chair

<ProductCard
  product={{
    name: 'Sedus se:do Pro Light Swivel Chair',
    price: '393,69â‚¬',
    rating: 4.3,
    reviewCount: 598,
    href: 'https://www.amazon.de/Sedus-Membrane-Adjustable-Armrests-Backrest/dp/B085GNPT98?keywords=sedus%2Bpro&qid=1688240169&sr=8-1-spons&sp_csd=d2lkZ2V0TmFtZT1zcF9hdGY&th=1&linkCode=ll1&tag=felixvemmerpersonalblog-21&linkId=35985a2654de0a5b1e1a6bc4730cf8e5&language=en_GB&ref_=as_li_ss_tl&ref=felixvemmer.com',
    imageSrc: '/pages/hardware/51USX-kSa0L._AC_SL1000_.jpg',
    imageAlt: 'Sedus se:do Pro Light Swivel Chair',
  }}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="ðŸ‘ Pros">
  N26 actually had these in their offices. I liked them so much when I quit so I decided to get one
  of them myself. Super comfortable, really good quality and love the minimalist design.
</Callout>

## My Desk

<ProductCard
  product={{
    name: 'SANODESK Basic Line',
    description:
      'Electrically Continuously Height-Adjustable Desk with Collision Protection, Memory Control and Soft Start/Stop Function. Great desk and collision detection can be great if you accidentally parked your chair below the table.',
    price: '289,99â‚¬',
    rating: 4.7,
    reviewCount: 347,
    href: 'https://www.amazon.de/SANODESK-Basic-Line-Electrically-Height-Adjustable/dp/B0816BQ2F6?keywords=sanodesk&qid=1688240877&sprefix=sano%2Caps%2C110&sr=8-1-spons&sp_csd=d2lkZ2V0TmFtZT1zcF9hdGY&psc=1&linkCode=ll1&tag=felixvemmerpersonalblog-21&linkId=2c1a7cdf0ba86347309fb31f5193f471&language=en_GB&ref_=as_li_ss_tl&ref=felixvemmer.com',
    imageSrc: '/pages/hardware/51ZiGIMYBIL._AC_SL1500_.jpg',
    imageAlt: 'SANODESK Basic Line',
  }}
/>

<Callout className="my-4" title="ðŸ‘ Pros">
  Great desk and collision detection can be great if you accidentally parked your chair below the
  table.
</Callout>

`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:`In this "My Personal Tech Gear" section, I'm excited to give you a tour of the tech hardware that powers my everyday life. `,(0,t.jsxDEV)(u,{className:"my-4",title:"\u{1F44D} Pros",children:(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:`Love the all day battery life, super good performance, excellent display, speakers, trackpad and
